text_eng:
Enjoy international cuisine at Yalumba , one of the hotel's 15 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/café. When you are in need of a refreshing drink, visit the swim-up bar or one of 3 bars/lounges, or 3 poolside bars. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 5:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 5 outdoor swimming pools, a nightclub, and a health club. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Dubai? This hotel has facilities measuring 44401 square feet (4125 square meters), including a conference center. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 383 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your Tempur-Pedic bed comes with down comforters and Frette Italian sheets. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and designer toiletries.
text_hr:
U restoranu Yalumba , jednom od 15 restorana u ovom hotelu, oduševit će vas međunarodna kuhinja. Možete i ostati u sobi te iskoristiti prednosti 24-satne posluge u sobu. Ako pak poželite male obroke, imate kavana/kafić. Kada se želite osvježiti, posjetite bar u bazenu ili jedan od 3 bara/salona ili 3 bara uz bazen. Doručak (švedski stol) dostupan je svaki dan od 5.30 do 10.30 uz nadoplatu. Opustite se u posjetu spa centru, u čijoj su ponudi masaže, tretmani za tijelo i tretmani za lice. Sigurno ćete uživati u rekreacijskim mogućnostima uz 5 vanjska bazena, noćni klub i rekreacijski klub. Ovaj hotel nudi dodatne pogodnosti koje uključuju besplatan bežični pristup internetu, usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge) i suvenirnice / novinske kioske. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju besplatan pristup žičanom internetu, 24-satni poslovni centar i usluge limuzine / prijevoza automobilom. Planirate neko događanje u mjestu Dubai? Ovaj objekt (ovaj hotel) ima prostore površine 44401 kvadr. st. (4125 m²), koji se sastoje od kongresnoga centra. Prijevoz od/do zračne luke (dostupno 24 sata) nudi se uz nadoplatu. U ponudi je i besplatna usluga parkiranja.
																Osjećat ćete se kao kod kuće u jednoj od 383 sobe/a/i s individualnim uređenjem, koje vam nude minibarove i LCD televizore. Vaš krevet ima udoban madrac (krevetu s madracem Tempur-Pedic), perine i talijanske plahte Frette. Zabavljat će vas satelitskim TV, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatni žičani i bežični pristup internetu. Privatne kupaonice opremljene su kombinacijama tuša i kade i nude dubokim kadama i dizajnerske toaletne potrepštine.

text_eng:
Enjoy our Free Fitness Center and Free Turkish Bath. Delight yourself with the best Italian and Tuscan Cuisine you ever tried at our Restaurant "Lo Zafferano" with our our Chef Fatjon Goga. Ask about our Free Golf options and enjoy Tuscany!
AC Hotel Arezzo offers modern accommodation in Arezzo, 5 minutes by car from the centre. It has a free fitness centre with Turkish bath. Your room features 4 pillows and Wi-Fi access. A generous buffet breakfast is included. The Arezzo AC Hotel offers a free car park, 2 meeting rooms, and the signature AC Lounge. Here you will find free newspapers, LCD TV, computers, and printers. The restaurant serves both Italian and international cuisine.
